name: Performapal Celestial Magician
text:
During your Main Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summoned this turn: You can apply the following effect(s) for the rest of this turn, based on the other monsters you currently control.
● Fusion: This card can attack directly. ● Synchro: Your opponent cannot activate monster effects. ● Xyz: This card's ATK becomes double its original ATK. ● Pendulum: During the End Phase, add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Performapal Celestial Magician" once per turn.
pendulum_text: When exactly 1 face-up Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Monster you control that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck is destroyed by battle, or an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon that destroyed monster, then destroy this card. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Celestial Magician" once per turn.
